content: I have a PR open around constants in match patterns, does anyone want to take over reviewing?
maybe I need to take another look
(could've asked me when it passed crater, since that's a pretty good confidence margin)
huh is Poison new? never seen it before
poison is around half a year old I think. we're using it for synthetic places (e.g. when we read from a zst but miri is expecting a place)

It's a major refactoring with functional changes, but I have pulled out all the changes that are doable individually into separate PRs already and don't think we can really do better than that huge diff.
all the actually critical code changes are in src/librustc_mir_build/thir/pattern/const_to_pat.rs (300 LOC according to github), but there's a huge amount of ui tests to review
